testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module

testcase.purpose: Check if 'column-span' is set to 'all' on pre tag

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if the element is set to have the number of columns,the width of columns,and both the number and width are set

spec.spec_statement: the number of columns, the width of columns, and both the number and width are set

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if the column-rule is a shorthand property and by the column-rule-width,column-rule-style,column-rule-color

spec.spec_statement: Another group of properties introduced in this module describe gaps and rules between columns.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if all column properties have their initial value, the layout of an element will be identical to a multi-column layout with only one column

spec.spec_statement: If all column properties have their initial value, the layout of an element will be identical to a multi-column layout with only one column.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if column width not set value automatically calculate the width of the column

spec.spec_statement: the column width will be determined by other properties

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if column count not set value according to the column width automatically calculate the number of columns

spec.spec_statement: means that the number of columns will be determined by other properties (e.g., ‘column-width’, if it has a non-auto value).

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if column rule property initial value

spec.spec_statement: Omitted values are set to their initial values

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if the column-rule-style value set none column-rule-width got value is 0px

spec.spec_statement: ‘0’ if the column rule style is ‘none’ or ‘hidden’

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if the column-rule-style value set hidden column-rule-width got value is 0px

spec.spec_statement: ‘0’ if the column rule style is ‘none’ or ‘hidden’

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if all column boxes in a row have the same column width, and all column boxes in a row have the same column height

spec.spec_statement: All column boxes in a row have the same column width, and all column boxes in a row have the same column height.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if the width of the image is set with these rules

spec.spec_statement: the width of the image is set with these rules

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if the width of the image is set float right

spec.spec_statement: Floats that appear inside multi-column layouts are positioned with regard to the column box where the float appears.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if the available space is smaller than the specified column width and the actual column width will therefore be decreased

spec.spec_statement: The available space is smaller than the specified column width and the actual column width will therefore be decreased.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if both column-width and column-count have non-auto values, the integer value describes the maximum number of columns

spec.spec_statement: both ‘column-width’ and ‘column-count’ have non-auto values, the integer value describes the maximum number of columns

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if a column rule is wider than its gap, the column rule will overlap adjacent column boxes, and possibly extend outside the box of the multicol element

spec.spec_statement: If a column rule is wider than its gap, the column rule will overlap adjacent column boxes, and possibly extend outside the box of the multicol element.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if the column rule and the column gap have the same width

spec.spec_statement: the column rule and the column gap have the same width. Therefore, they will occupy exactly the same space.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if a tall image is moved to a column on the next page to find room when the column do not have enough space to place it

spec.spec_statement: a tall image is moved to a column on the next page to find room for it, its natural column may be left empty

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if column-span to all, all content that appear before the h2 element is shown before the h2 element

spec.spec_statement: By setting ‘column-span’ to ‘all’, all content that appear before the h2 element is shown before the h2 element

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if the H2 element appears in the overflow and there is not room to make the element spanning

spec.spec_statement: the H2 element appears in the overflow and there is not room to make the element spanning. As a result, the element appears as if ‘column-span: none’ was specified.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if the image is wider than the column, and is therefore clipped

spec.spec_statement: the black image is wider than the column, and is therefore clipped

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if the height of the multi-column element has been constrained to a maximum height

spec.spec_statement: the height of the multi-column element has been constrained to a maximum height. Also, the style sheet specifies that overflowing content should be visible

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if in order to fill the available space the actual column width will be increased

spec.spec_statement: There is room for two 45px wide columns inside the 100px wide element. In order to fill the available space the actual column width will be increased to 50px.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if all column rules in the same row are also equal,column rules only appear between columns that both have content

spec.spec_statement: All column rules in the same row are also equal, if they appear; column rules only appear between columns that both have content

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if columns are properly automatic when 'column-fill: auto' is set

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if an article starts with an unbreakable figure which can sets the column height

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if after the column height has been established, columns are filled sequentially

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if columns are properly balanced when 'column-fill: balance' is set

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if multicol column with integer display correctly in visual

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if multicol column-count with integer display correctly in visual

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if multicol column with width display correctly in visual

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Multi-column Layout Module
testcase.purpose: Check if multicol column-count with width display correctly in visual
